Description:
The Best of Both Worlds and Water Views
With a spectacular outlook from every window in this Architectually designed home and Situated only moments from Drysdale's main shopping centre & Point Lonsdale and Ocean Grove sandy beaches is a rare opportunity to purchase 5 glorious acres in one of the most fertile areas of the Bellarine Peninsula.
Found on a beautifully quiet road surrounded by open fields this spacious home ensures that every room has a view of either the natural landscape or the panoramic vista across Port Philip Bay, Swan bay to Queenscliff and beyond. From the entry, the main lounge and dining rooms enjoy this view from full walls of windows and also boast an open fire place in the centre of the room and a fully functioning bar to one end.
The hub of the home is definitely the enormous country style, timber kitchen with walk in pantry and vintage wood stove but also contains a more modern gas cooktop and stainless steel electric oven. The open family meals and living rooms are situated here as well with further walls of glass opening onto a paved entertaining area and overlooking the property to the line of towering pine trees & wood lot to the north.
4 large sized bedrooms, (king sized master with walk in robe almost the size of a bedroom itself, and equally spacious ensuite with double vanity and shower plus separate wc, all opening onto a private courtyard fernery) lie in a wing of their own that boasts a uniquely shaped (to also capture views) rumpus room and study/fourth bedroom plus family bathroom, vast laundry, wc and additional powder room for guests.
The home is heated by solid fuel, reverse cycle heating/cooling, large open fireplace in formal lounge, woodfire canara in main living, gas heater (in the rumpus) but has been cleverly designed to capture sun in winter and remain cool in summer. Stunning slate floors and exposed timber ceilings (some cathedral), provide an ambience that is distinctly suited to the surrounds but also has the potential to be modernised for a more contemporary feel.
The property will please all members of the family with horse paddocks and stables, a triple car brick garage with ample storage and additional shedding with concrete, power and water which could be used as an additional studio, further accomodaion or work-shop shed.. Tank water services the home with an abundance of storage that has never run out even with a full household in the worst drought conditions. The established gardens and the HUGE variety of fruit treesYour dream of self sustainable living could easily become a reality here.
- 5 acres approx.
- Panoramic water views
- 33 squares of living (approx.)
- Abundant garaging and shedding
- Close to Ocean Grove beaches, Drysdale and Point Lonsdale
Also view standalone web site www.45banksroad.com
Land: 5 acres approx.
Insights: 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Walk to Central Shops-Renovated
Just a short stroll to the heart of Drysdale with shops, supermarkets, restaurants, schools and public transport this newly renovated home is well worth an inspection! Freshly painted with new carpets and ducted heating, cooling and vacuuming throughout the home offers 3 generous bedrooms with new BIRs, the master with WIR, serviced by updated bathroom complete with bath and separate second toilet. The bright lounge leads to kitchen/meals area with quality appliances & plenty of storage. Externally the undercover entertaining area leads to the well-established backyard with over sized SLUG & carport ideal for caravan or boat storage, all positioned on a generous 600sqm(approx) allotment. With nothing to do but move in and enjoy, this is a must see home!
Inspect Saturday 30th between 10am - 2pm by appointment contact agent.
Insights: 129 Barrands Lane, DRYSDALE VIC 3222 was last sold in 2012 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in DRYSDALE have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Home Site - 544m2
Coriyule Estate Drysdale is located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within close proximity to beaches, wineries, and all the amenities that Drysdale has to offer. The Bellarine rail trail is also located on your door step and the Clifton Springs marina is a short distance down the road. This exciting release of land is now available with a range of block sizes. Secure your future home site today.

Description:
Spacious 2 Bedroom Unit For Sale
A well maintained spacious unit is one of 10 in a sought after area of Drysdale (near Geelong) The unit is positioned at the rear of the complex and provides a sense of quiet privacy. Use your remote entry to the undercover parking space that opens on to a well maintained rear garden on three sides.
The rear lounge/dining gets the morning sun. The carport has an entry through a spacious laundry with generous storage. Both bedrooms have built in robes. Main bedroom has direct access to an ensuite/bathroom.Out the front you have the advantage of another parking space.This unit is a short walking distance to shopping and amenaties.

Description:
Grand Central Home
Just a short walk to central Drysdale with shops, cafes and supermarkets, this beautifully presented home on a huge 746sqm(approx)allotment and is sure to appeal
Comprising 3 separate living areas, leading through double French doors to 2nd family living, open plan meals, and immaculate kitchen with quality S/S appliances, gas cooking, walk-in pantry & timber flooring opening onto the fully equipped theatre room. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout will ensure your comfort all year round. Finished to a high standard and boasting 4 bedrooms with floor to ceiling BIRs the luxury master with WIR, full ensuite complete with dbl vanity and shower, the separate powder room and bathroom providing plenty of space for the family. Externally features an oversized DLUG with rear access to 4 car shed with wood heater, 3 phase power, side driveway ideal for that boat or caravan, spacious court yard & undercover entertainment deck - the list goes on.
Why go to the trouble of building when it is all right here?

Description:
“Ael-y-bryn” Character Weatherboard Charm
“Ael-y-bryn” (c.1920's) on 1.1 ha - 2.7 acres (approx) is down a quiet country lane close to town.
Close to shops, schools & public transport, this property combines rural living with urban convenience. Quality renovation to the original Gravedigger's residence has the charming 3-bedroom character weatherboard enjoying extensive garden views, European kitchen appliances & CaesarStone benchtops, split system A/C & solid wood heater, two living areas, large family bathroom, & a Master bedroom with ensuite and original open fire. Additional outbuildings include a double carport with 2 entertainment rooms; separate guest studio with B&B potential. Machinery shed with second driveway within landscaped grounds that support self-sufficiency with established orchard vegetable gardens and mains/tank water. A wide street frontage and close proximity to the town centre equals future subdivision potential (STCA).
Peter Lindeman : 0418525609

Description:
Drysdale Living with a Rural Influence
Completely renovated on approx 560m2 of land in a new sub-division, this is a brilliant opportunity to secure a central Drysdale property. Within a short walk to Lake Lorne Reserve, Bellarine Rail Trail and the Historic Drysdale Train Station, this property encapsulates the mix of Central Drysdale living with a Rural Influence. Comprising 3 bedrooms, central renovated bathroom, new kitchen, new carpets and floor coverings, freshly polished floor boards and open plan living, this well priced solid home offers more that the average sub $300,000 property in todays market.

Description:
“Ael-y-bryn” Character Weatherboard Charm
“Ael-y-bryn” (c.1920's) on 1.1 ha - 2.7 acres (approx) is down a quiet country lane close to town.
Close to shops, schools & public transport, this property combines rural living with urban convenience. Quality renovation to the original Gravedigger's residence has the charming 3-bedroom character weatherboard enjoying extensive garden views, European kitchen appliances & CaesarStone benchtops, split system A/C & solid wood heater, two living areas, large family bathroom, & a Master bedroom with ensuite and original open fire. Additional outbuildings include a double carport with 2 entertainment rooms; separate guest studio with B&B potential. Machinery shed with second driveway within landscaped grounds that support self-sufficiency with established orchard vegetable gardens and mains/tank water. A wide street frontage and close proximity to the town centre equals future subdivision potential (STCA).
Peter Lindeman : 0418525609

Description:
Great Block, North Facing Yard - 544m2
Coriyule Estate Drysdale is located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within close proximity to beaches, wineries, and all the amenities that Drysdale has to offer. The Bellarine rail trail is also located on your door step and the Clifton Springs marina is a short distance down the road. This exciting release of land is now available with a range of block sizes. Secure your future home site today.

Description:
Why build? When its all here!
Positioned within easy walking distance to schools, shops, child care and public transport, this modern family home is everything you have been looking for.
Comprising 2 separate living areas the first at the front of the home, leading to open plan meals, 2nd living with split system A/C and kitchen with quality S/S appliances & walk-in pantry.
Featuring study plus 3 generous bedrooms, master complete with WIR and ensuite, the remaining rooms with BIRs.
Externally offering large undercover entertainment area, over sized DLUG with rear roller access, and tropical-style solar heated in ground swimming pool. All positioned on a substantial 719sqm(approx) allotment just minutes to Drysdale and its amenities. Inspection is a must!

Walk to Shops, Bowls and Bus
